memberdef.name: tn_usage03
memberdef.initializer: = " Sets the sensor <sensornumber> to the value <sensorvalue>"

memberdef.name: tn_usage05
memberdef.initializer: = " Pushes a value direct to a channel inside a node"

memberdef.name: tn_usage07
memberdef.initializer: = " adds or deletes a verboseLevel. Valid levels are:"

memberdef.name: tn_usage08
memberdef.initializer: = " config; telnet; rf24; sql; sensor; order; orderext; obuffer; obufferext; other; pointer"

memberdef.name: tn_usage09
memberdef.initializer: = " set verbose all: adds all verboseLevel; set verbose none: deletes all"

memberdef.name: tn_usage11
memberdef.initializer: = " sets a node to mastered (gets commands from this Hub) or unmastered"

memberdef.name: tn_usage13
memberdef.initializer: = " sets a gateway active (on) or inactive (off)"

memberdef.name: tn_usage15
memberdef.initializer: = " adds a active gateway to the system"

memberdef.name: tn_usage17
memberdef.initializer: = " deletes a gateway from the system"

memberdef.name: tn_usage21
memberdef.initializer: = " Syncs all in Memory tables to the persistent tables"

memberdef.name: tn_usage23
memberdef.initializer: = " lists the content of the order queue"

memberdef.name: tn_usage25
memberdef.initializer: = " lists the nodes and sensors in system"

memberdef.name: tn_usage_txt
memberdef.initializer: = { tn_usage01, tn_usage02, tn_usage03, tn_usage04, tn_usage05, tn_usage06, tn_usage07, tn_usage08, tn_usage09, tn_usage10, tn_usage11, tn_usage12, tn_usage13, tn_usage14, tn_usage15, tn_usage16, tn_usage17, tn_usage18, tn_usage19, tn_usage20, tn_usage21, tn_usage22, tn_usage23, tn_usage24, tn_usage25, tn_usage26, tn_usage27, tn_usage28, tn_usage29, tn_usage30, tn_usage31 }

detaileddescription.para: all text messages for rf24hubd goes here => Easy to translate!
